alert.note: Alert for Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 1:55PM MST until January 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches below 6500 feet MSL and 8 to 12 above 6500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...South Hills and Albion Mountains including but not limited to Conner Summit, City of Rocks NR, Albion, and Almo. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Breezy winds will lead to areas of blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.
